package main

templ x() {
	<div>{{
    hello := "world"
}}</div>
	<div id="with-spaces">{{

		hello = "world"
		}}</div>
	<div id="multiline-expressions-stay-multiline">

		hello = "world"
		name := "foo"
		}}

}
-- out --
package main

templ x() {
	<div>
		{{ hello := "world" }}
	</div>
	<div id="with-spaces">
		{{ hello = "world" }}
	</div>
	<div id="multiline-expressions-stay-multiline">
		{{
			hello = "world"
			name := "foo"
		}}
	</div>
}
